name: Downtown Z
description:
Downtown Z is a first-person shooter game . You are a survivor and you´ll have to earn money, to buy better weapons and to kill more Zombies.

features:

* a money system

* a weapon buying system

* melee and range weapons

* some NPCs (including a nurse providing healing services)

* a huge City to explore

upcoming features:

*more NPCs

*Quests

* a story

* interior areas

* easter eggs

try the game and visit me on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/Duncantheartist/
